title: The Circle's 'Sammie' and Tim block Jan as James is branded the 'master manipulator' by viewers
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Tuesday's episode of The Circle saw contestants 'Sammie' and Tim go head to head as they struggled to decide who to block from the game.

With two days to go and £100,00 up for grabs, the competition heated up on The Circle as the players put their game faces on.

'Sammie' played a clever game as he tried to encourage Tim to save his 'circle of trust' friends Paddy and Georgina.

'Sammie', who is a catfish played by James, wanted to de-throne popular Circle contestant Ella in a bid to secure his place in the final three.

Wednesday's episode on Channel 4 saw contestant Jan get blocked as she failed to impress contestants as her true self.

The next morning, Tim hinted at his slight suspicions of 'Sammie' as he encouraged Woody to protect himself and Ella in a private chat.

Tim made a cryptic reference to someone potentially being a catfish. Woody literally got goosebumps as he realised that Tim is referring to 'Sammie'.

(Image: Channel 4)

(Image: Channel 4)

(Image: Channel 4)

As Tim started to think he made friends with a manipulator, 'Sammie', The Circle fans slammed James' and his game plan to be fake to get to the top.

His deceitful nature led viewers to brand him as the show's master manipulator.

One user wrote: "James/Sammie is an absolute master manipulator."

Another posted: "James 'Sammie' is a lying scheming scam artist."

(Image: Channel 4)

(Image: Channel 4)

While a third shed light on the sadness of the games reality by pointing out that manipulation wins over truth.

They wrote: "Sammie is playing a good game, but it;'s just so fustrating to see manipulation and nastiness triumphing over kindness and loyalty."

"Sammie/James is one of the most manipulative people to ever walk on earth."

Later in the episode during an anonymous Circle chat, 'Sammie' continued to attempt to stir the pot with Ella accusations.

Elsewhere, Tim declared he was being manipulated by 'Sammie' as he started to notice 'her' game plan.

(Image: Channel 4)

At the end of the show, all three members of the COT 'circle of trust', Georgina, Paddy and 'Sammie' had a private chat about how their plan to eliminate the most popular players was working.

In a game where anyone can be anyone, players of the show live in the same building but reside in completely different apartments.

But the players never meet face to face and communicate only via social media platform The Circle in a bid to be voted the most popular by other contestants.

*The final of The Circle takes place this Friday on Channel 4 at 10pm.
description: The Circle viewers brand 'Sammie' (James) as the 'master manipulator' as his game plan to get to the top continues
